attributes.action: Stop the propaganda against Russia for the good work they are doing in Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
Hilary leaked email.
http://insider.foxnews.com/2016/10/11/leaked-email-shows-hillary-clinton-reportedly-wrote-saudi-arabia-qatar-funding-isis

White helmets exposed.
http://www.activistpost.com/2016/05/white-helmets-ngo-a-rescue-and-assist-operation-under-guise-of-human-rights.html
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5k6hSS6xBTw

Rebels funded by the west
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/magazine-33997408
attributes.background: We know the west have been funding the rebels in Syria who end up working for the highest bidder ie ISIS.  We know the white helmets are used as the Wests propagandists.  We also know from leaked emails Qatar and Saudi Arabia are funding ISIS, I propose we help Russia and target Saudi Arabia instead
